name: Eggy
description: The little chick stays in its shell for a while after hatching. It feeds on little insects that crawl nearby.

name: Birdactyl
description: As the shell grows small, the fletchling becomes more confident. It hunt smaller critters, threatening them with its claws.

name: Crustavian
description: Mastering flight, surface and water, it fights everything and anything that comes within its territory. Its punch is strong enough to knockout an Indian elephant.

name: Sparksmall
description: This little guy floats from power source to power source. It feeds on energy to grow big and strong.

name: Plugfey
description: After consuming large amounts of energy, it plugs its tendrils into the ground. This behavour is theorised to help with digestion.

name: Titantricity
description: Titantricity roams the fields around powerlines. This hungry monster is often the cause of power outages in towns.

name: Spidorby
description: Spidorbies harmlessly wander around forests hoping to stumble into food. When threatened, they roll away in panic.

name: Websacc
description: Its shell is made of thick web. While it hibernates, its internal temperature reaches as high as 100 degrees.

name: Pyrantula
description: It builds elaborate webs around the outskirts of forests. After starting a fire, it hopes the prey will get trapepd in the webs while trying to escape.

name: Skulemu
description: It kept its consciousness after death, but could not move without its body. It used short-term possesion of smaller critters to reassemble its skeleton.

name: Cybostrich
description: Genetic research has allowed to have its body regenerated based on its memories. Cyborg parts allow it to move slowly in the meantime.

name: Rheafetherd
description: After reconstruction, the dinosaur has gained immense speed. It enjoys testing its speed by chasing Indian elephants.

name: Clodsoil
description: Clodsoil moves around dirt, absorbing nutriens as it goes. Sometimes it eats the grass growing on it as well.

name: Earthclump
description: It can merge with earth below it to maneuver around quickly. The flower on its head is part of its nervous system.

name: Subterrchomp
description: To a naked eye, this creature looks like a small hill. It waits for unsuspecting prey to approach before eating it whole.

name: Nitrotod
description: This mysterious lizard scurries at night eating bolts. It squirts ligth blue liquid from its eyes for protection.

name: Skinkbolt
description: This creature instantly extends its neck to reach far away targets. The metal coat covering its throat can sustain a lot of damage.

name: Basilength
description: Despite being made of steel, it can float effortlessly in the air. Its iron will also allows it to survive in space.

name: Quatrap
description: The four heads are efficient at multitasking. One baits critters with nectar, other fights off predators, and the final two eat dirt for nutrients.

name: Misigil
description: This rocky creature absorbs all nearby misfortune. It tricks other creatures into an unwinnable game to aggrevate them and feed on their strong anger.

name: Ghamblegoul
description: Ghamblegoul invites weaker souls for some light-hearted bets. After a few deliberate losses, it ramps up to win the other player's soul in a rigged fashion.

name: Umbrams
description: This critter moves around using its spectral limbs. The stronger its soul, the more arms it can have.

name: Clayball
description: The everchanging eyball flies across the skies at immense speeds. Ancient folk used to worship this monster, dubbing it "Spirit of Flight".

name: Deflatoon
description: This critter assumes an appearanece of a discarded balloon. It feeds on trash after being thrown away when mistaken for litter.

name: Elecflate
description: It's body is full of electrified air. Touching it just once will make the victim experience static shocks for hours.

name: Vensap
description: The little sprout needs to eat three times its weight in a day. It hops around, using all of its strength to lift its pot.

name: Plexgraft
description: None of the heads have a mind of its own. Their brains have merged into one inside of the reinforced pot.

name: Catirpath
description: The tiny Catirpath spends most of its day eating leaves and sleeping. It doesn't know a parasite resides within in.

name: Parastingd
description: Feeling disturbances from inside, the bug fruitlessly tries to drive its parasite away. This leaves it in a scarred state.

name: Outburstingd
description: After reaching maturity, the parasite roams freely, abandoning its host. It's toxic is potent enough to make an Indian elephant suffer.

name: Cocoore
description: In an effort to fight off its disease, the bug develops a powerful psychic-based immune system. It's mental powers are fighting to defeat the parasite once and for all.

name: Curemoth
description: The powder produced by this monster have potent healing qualities. A concoction brewed from it can make a sickly Indian elephant healthy again.

name: Choiceprit
description: The creature seems to keep track of something on its rocky body. It's very conflicted on the role of luck in its life.

name: Tyranoplush
description: This doll looks to be based on a dinosaur with wings. It chases off critters away from its home trash bin.

name: Divanosaurus
description: It ate so much it is now square. An Indian elephant could sit on it comfortably.

name: Snario
description: This shiny creature lies motionless in grass. It waits for a curios critter to approach it before snaring it with its ghastly claws.

name: Betsoul
description: This ghastly critter enjoys challenge. It eagerly bets its own food to see if it can do better than its rivals.

name: Airbastrike
description: The flame that lifts this monster is its very own soul. It flies high enough, then drops on its target trying to crush them.

name: Stitchspook
description: This ghost lives in a toy long abandoned by its owner. It prefers to stick around landfills.

name: Twirlead
description: This critters seems to be cosntantly spinning in place. This tactic could disorient predators.

name: Spinneron
description: The friction is creates from spinning can start a fire. Wherever it goes, it leaves a burning trail behind it.

name: Stahldance
description: This monster does elaborate spinny dances to distract its enemies. Those mesmerised by its motion tend to not notice being engulfed in flames.

name: Ghostingd
description: The soul of the bug persists within the husk after the parasite has long left. The wings it creates out of pure malice are frequently used for devastating cuts.

name: Huscure
description: The parasite's soul that once lived in the bug now resides within this husk. It uses its wings created from its gratitude for a second chance for life to protect weaker creatures.

name: Earthquartz
description: This monster is filled with anxiety. It trembles in fear and the area around it shakes noticeably.

name: Gazeblaze
description: The creature sits lazily on the ground as absorbs minerals from the soil. Those observing it always see it staring back.

name: Silliscorch
description: Its rocky carapace keeps protects its mostly liquid innards. The hand-tail sticks itself to objects of interest by melting into them slightly.

name: Cragmarin
description: The smaller the specimen is, the more energy it keeps. A controlled explosion by this monster can wipe out a small population of Indian elephants.

name: Eyetum
description: These dragons pace around caves looking for crystals to eat. Their stomach appears to act as a massive eye as well.

name: Ocularge
description: A diet of rare rocks made it grow a crystal on its back. The spiny skin it has makes other creatures avoid touching it.

name: Cyclash
description: The superior vision on its stomach eye makes this monster prefer using it for sight. A strike with its tentacles can leave a mark on an Indian elephant for two weeks.

name: Unicardic
description: Interestingly, the heart of this creature is made of a single cell. It subtly manipulates moisture around itself to create a gooey layer of protection.

name: Dicelluar
description: Its unique celluar structure gives it a bizarre ability to survive in the most hostile environments. Its keen sense of smell allows it to locate the sneakiest of Indian elephants.

name: Panmoeba
description: Panmoeba's heart is a complex creature in its own right. It grew legs in order to leg it in case it's slime exterior is removed in some way.

name: Centuriworm
description: Centuriworm's carapce slightly resembles a tank. The marshes it patrols are usually empty as its presence drives the local fauna away.

name: Scorpright
description: This critter shines dimly in the dark. A group of them communicates by adjusting its brightness slightly.

name: Dazzletaur
description: Dazzletaurs live in small tribes in deserts. Their skin's brightness is strong enough to blind an Indian elephant.

name: Arachlit
description: This monster lives deep inside caves. Many missing miners are presumed to have mistaken its bright scales for an exit.

name: Koshmare
description: Koshmare is a hypothetical creatrue not yet confirmed to exist. There is a large amount of consistent reports of it being sighted in dreams, but any attempt to track it down did not yield results.

name: Clawmaton
description: This creature scuttles around scrapyards looking for bolts to eat. It can use its claws to strike with surgical percision.

name: Crabrage
description: Crabrage spends most of its time actively looking for a fight. It will go after any Indian elephant that looks at it the wrong way.

name: Geysurge
description: This curious critter pokes its head out of the ground looking for food. In winter it sometimes freezes over, making a nice looking ice pillar.

name: Squallie
description: This monster lives in the sea, creating massive waves capturing nearby sealife into its grasp. You can tell it's nearby if it inexplicably starts raining.

name: Stuffosaurus
description: After growing big and strong, this creature finally leaves its adopted trash filled home. It now roams the fields among Indian elephants.

name: Shadesurfer
description: Despite its size, it can effortlessly dive into the shade realm and travel along the shadows. The multiple eyes on its body are always alert, even when sleeping.

name: Spiritwig
description: It lives in dense forests overlooking an area. If a small creature approaches a predator's territory, it will start rustling its leaves to scare them away.

name: Forestnight
description: It patrols the skies above the forest, scanning for any disturbances. If it sense a threat to the environment, it will attack the offender.

name: Charmbow
description: This guy floats lazily to populated cities. It likes to hang around within audible range of cheering and laughter.

name: Ribbonhart
description: Ribbonhart can be seen digging through trash is large cities. The sunglasses it wears are presumed to have been acquired through scavenging.

name: Wraploves
description: This creature is unusually friendly to people. It likes to hug those it peceives as allies by wrapping around them with its ribbons.

name: Radislime
description: Its body is constantly emitting energy. It hops around, weakining its prey with radiation.

name: Mortooze
description: Mortooze's cannons are powered by its own body's radiactive output. While slow, it is capable of launching large projectiles over 20 metres.

name: Gattljam
description: This beast has replaced its slimy body with mechanical armour. Its gattling gun can rev itself up in 5 seconds for upto a minute of continious fire.

name: Chelydrair
description: This monster slowly floats in the air, snapping at any approaching object. It is strong enough to carry an Indian elephant for a some time.

name: Celefors
description: This being used to be worshiped as the "Spirit of Strength" in the Ancient times. Its ability to seemingly magically manipulate force and surprising aggression makes further research hard to conduct.

name: Imcheined
description: Imcheined has been biologically generated in accordance to ancient blueprints drafted by an ancient cult, dedicated to the titans. It is believed to house the soul of the deity who waged war against mortals eons ago.

name: Opposoot
description: Opposoot slightly burns its own food stash, tracking it later with its powerful sense of smell. It cannot see, but somehow still can tell when it is being watched.

name: Posmoke
description: Possmoke can detect nearby brain activity using its heightened mind. It can communicate with its allies using smoke signals and can be taught new signals by people.

name: Ashsupial
description: Ashsupial communicates with its ancestors to gain their wisdom. It appears to have trouble reaching its ancient predcessors, probably because its cousins might be attempting contact with the same relative.

name: Scutlewing
description: The little hatchling is born alone on a mountain. While not very smart, it instinctively knows how to fly.

name: Skietoise
description: Skietoises live in small colonies with up to five members. They hunt small birds displaying a surprising ability to cooperate as a pack.

name: Medunaxy
description: The galaxy it surrounds is not known to contain any discovered celestial bodies. Its impossible to tell whether it is based on any area in outer space or its own personal navigation map.

name: Galephoon
description: In the old legend, Galephoon is dubbed "The Warrior of the Four Winds". It is described to have saved a small village by redirecting all the fire arrows directly into the attacking nation's ships, eliminating their entire fleet.

name: Gobigob
description: It tries to put anything it sees into its mouth. If that object starts moving it will spit it out and start screaming.

name: Bibgob
description: Its intestines are full of extremely noxious posion. It has been observing being fed a wide range of objects, but has never been recorded feeling ill from indigestion.

name: Gourmegob
description: Gourmegob seems to have knowledge of everything that went into a dish it is eating. When detecting something suspicious in its allies' food, it will flail violently until the offending meal is disposed of.

name: Fanairby
description: Despite being relatively heavy, this critter is capable of floating. If it is not careful, it can run out of battery and become dormant for a day.

name: Fanairbine
description: Fanairbine is capable of slowing its decent, allowing it to descent from mountains safely. It attacks predators and prey by launching gusts of wind using its arm fans.

name: Fanairbinator
description: Fanairbinator sticks to areas with extreme windspeeds. It can reserve energy enought to last three days, constantly moving, before needing to recharge again.

name: Palmonut
description: Palmonut sticks to the beaches, scavenging for food. It will always try to throw a punch before scuttling away from a threat.

name: Cocopalm
description: It gathers coconuts by punching the trees with its strong fists. The leftover fruit shells are often used to protect its hands from recoil.

name: Cocobrawl
description: A punch from this creature can break an Indian elephant's bone. It always tries to lead a pack, unless any other member can defeat it in battle.

name: Repsnowwy
description: The optical cameras on its helmet can switch between heat based vision and light based vision. It is kept warm in the snow by the video processors implanted into it.

name: Coldsnaker
description: The back fans can be used to raise its speed considerably, at the price of its stealthiness. The enhanced AI in its helmet can automatically detect suitable prey to hunt.

name: Cybroliz
description: The mechanical limbs it had developed are used to fight larger enemies. It seems to use its own shedded skin to craft camouflage to put on its tech.

name: Hatchnix
description: While common pets in the past, they have seemingly disappeared. It is said to be able to switch its flames into other elements.

name: Adolonix
description: Mages used to use Adolonixes as their hunting partners. While normally covered in flames, it would change its plummage to match its partner's magic.

name: Peregryth
description: Peregryth sightings are incredibly rare, but not unheard of. It is theorised they can travel to some other realm, untraceable using current science and magic.

name: Imcelebreted
description: Declassified research papers imply this creature might have been a faulty attempt to create an Imcheined. It is reported to be very cheerful, only displaying sorrow when seeing chains or swords.

name: Trapkold
description: The origin of the fish encased in the ice is not known. This being does not move when it perceives being watched, sliding around only when it knows no one is looking.

name: Glacierpse
description: The ice keeps growing despite the tempersture not being suitable for freezing water. This monster seems to comprehend how cameras work, but can still be tricked by a sufficiently hidden one.

name: Permaroten
description: The frozen biomatter has decayed enough to be noticeable. While the deformed fish looks dangerous, it appears to not be used for anything other than intimidation.

name: Archepond
description: Archeponds spend their time patiently waiting for their prey to move above the water. They shoot a pojectile from their mouth with enough force that an Indian elephant could feel it.

name: Spittva
description: This creature eats dirt and heats it up to a ridicilous degree. It has been recorded spitting lava 100 meteres away from the lake it resides in.

name: Magmaphul
description: Magmaphul fills it's mouth with roughly half its weight of magma. It prefers to drop chunks of it as it lazily swims above its prey.

name: Scorporby
description: Scorporbies are incredibly territorial and will attack interlopers on sight. Grabbing its tail will neutralise it fast, but it will remember.

name: Cryosacc
description: Its shell is made of thick ice. It senses if something is nearby and will start swinging its stinger around violently.

name: Empercold
description: This monster viciously rushes down prey and rivals alike. Its cold shell cannot melt while it is alive.

name: Lunulithos
description: Lunulithos finds allies by releasing an aura that grants them strength. They used to be thought to be rare, until a massive colony was discovered in space.

name: Tadspeckle
description: Tadspeckles live around cities eating discarded food. They use their psychic powers to quickly scale buildings to avoid predators and pest control.

name: Croacopath
description: Croacopath uses its heghtened intellect to generate psychic barriers. Staring at its spotty pattern often leads to eye strain.

name: Ampsibian
description: This monster can be seen floating motionlessly at night. It dispatches of any threat by poisoning its enemy's mind.

name: Blowcoral
description: It can make bubbles to traverse the world beyond the sea. This curious creature enjoys surveying rocks.

name: Colonubble
description: Colonubble often travels back into its home seas to replenish the water for its bubble. The other two Blowcorals cannot make bubbles themselves, which is why Colonubble took them under its custody.

name: Reefarmor
description: Despite its size, Reefarmor can fly across a surface at staggering speeds. The smaller Blowcorals on its back help manipulate water, allowing for more control.

name: Lunateorite
description: These monsters tend to orbit cosmic bodies, absorbing sunrays of a nearby star. Some orbit this planet as well, being visible in the night sky in complete darkness.

name: Corrodrip
description: It waits patiently on cave ceilings for its prey to wander below. Once you can feel ooze dropping down, it's too late, you cannot escape Corrodrip's attack.

name: Burialmite
description: These docile critters tend to slowly pace around cemetires. After finding a mask to protect its body, it is fused into their skin.

name: Feelyspike
description: The stingers of this simple-minded organism are very powerful touch sensing organs. It digs elaborate tunnels underground to sneak past its predators.

name: Feelysight
description: To survive in harsh snowy landscapes, this creature gained a pair of eyes. Despite its vision being subpar, it has proven useful enough to prevent collisions with aggressive monsters.
